mapper.select: select room_id, create_time, modify_time, room_number, create_user, opponents, watch_user, go_id, room_status, room_name, room_password from gobang.gb_room where room_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into gobang.gb_room(create_time, modify_time, room_number, create_user, opponents, watch_user, go_id, room_status, room_name, room_password) values (now(), now(), #{roomNumber}, #{createUser}, #{opponents}, #{watchUser}, #{goId}, #{roomStatus}, #{roomName}, #{roomPassword})
